title: Exact Solution Procedure for the Log-Linear Continuous Knapsack Problem
abstract:
We provide an exact algorithm to solve the log-linear continuous (fractional)
knapsack problem. The algorithm is based on two lemmas that follow from the
application of weak duality theorem and complementary slackness theorem to the
linear optimization problem with linear objective function that is associated
with any solution of a linear optimization problem with (differentiable)
concave objective function.
